lead_paragraph: Mr. Harada said it was not until the 50th anniversary of the airstrike that he learned the raid had been a sneak attack and that Japan had not declared war on the United States.

byline.contributor: Makiko Inoue contributed reporting from Tokyo.

headline.print_headline: Kaname Harada, Pearl Harbor Fighter Pilot Who Became Pacifist, Dies at 99
headline.main: Kaname Harada, Pearl Harbor Fighter Pilot and, Later, a Pacifist, Dies at 99

snippet: Mr. Harada said it was not until the 50th anniversary of the airstrike that he learned the raid had been a sneak attack and that Japan had not declared war on the United States.
abstract: Kaname Harada, last known fighter ace to fly for Japan in Pearl Harbor attack, who later became pacifist out of remorse for deaths he caused, dies at age 99.
